other_tests.findings: Direct bacterial examination showed many gram-positive bacilli identified as P. acnes.
Revealed fibrinous pleurisy and chronic inflammatory lesions of the lung.
Bacterial cultures were positive for P. acnes after 10 days.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Isolate was resistant to cotrimoxazole, susceptible to penicillin, doxycycline, erythromycin, vancomycin, and rifampicin, complete clinical and biological remission achieved within 3 weeks.

other_tests.date: Post-treatment and last follow-up visit three years later
other_tests.findings: Normal findings at the end of treatment and at the last follow-up.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Abnormal findings initially that normalized after treatment.

other_tests.date: At age 3 years and at age 10 years for Patient 2
